tr.td: Element `ConditionDefinition.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `ConditionDefinition.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `ConditionDefinition.language` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `ConditionDefinition.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `ConditionDefinition.contained` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `ConditionDefinition.identifier` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Basic.identifier` and is compatible, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `ConditionDefinition.identifier`: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/artifact-identifier`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 ConditionDefinition to FHIR R4 Basic

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 ConditionDefinition to FHIR R4.

comment.value: Element `ConditionDefinition.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta` and is compatible, use that element instead.
